basics.name: Carlos Sussmann
basics.label:
Food | Events | Products | Interiors

www.kagloos.com

As a regular traveler, I got into digital photography in 2004. After many years and many more photos, it has become one of the passions of my life. Since 2015 I've also been doing studio photography, focusing on food and products.

My aim is always to create the best images possible, using the latest technology and the necessary photographic techniques to achieve the most effective results. This way, my photos convey a message, or even tell a story.

work.company: KagLoos  Photography, Prague, The Capital, Czech Republic
Kingspan, Prague, The Capital, Czech Republic
OTTO BLANC, Prague, The Capital, Czech Republic
work.desc: Product photography for e-shop & fashion photography for website.

work.company: Divadelní Klub Swan, Prague, The Capital, Czech Republic
work.desc: Volunteer photographer for Swan Prague Festival. Provided photos can be displayed via Swan Prague Festival Facebook page.

Reportage photography to document Opera Conference 'Exciting job while doubling sales', conducted by business coach Laurent Laval.

This conference took place at Hotel Hilton Old Town (Prague).

Reportage photography to document one session (#10) of the workshop 'Breakfast&Workshop Public Speaking', conducted by communication coach Andreas Fehrens.

This workshop took place at Smart Place Krizovatka (Prague).

Event photography to document the event 'Open Studio' by Obejvák artists. 

This event took place at Obejvák Shared Art Studio&Community (Prague).
Interior photography for Spanish food store 'Toro Blanco', located in Prague.

Event photography to document the event 'Výlet po Španělsku' (Trip through Spain) by Laurent Laval and Barceló Hotels. 

This event took place at Hotel Barceló Praha (Prague).

Event photography to document the event 'Halloween Party' by Obejvák. 

This event took place at Obejvák Shared Art Studio&Community (Prague).

Reportage photography to document workshop 'Importance of nonverbals!', sponsored by Integrated Micro-Electronics CZ and conducted by communication coach Andreas Fehrens.

This workshop took place at University of West Bohemia (Plzen).

Reportage photography to document the presentation and kickoff meeting of coaching program, conducted by Laurent Laval.

This meeting took place at Hotel Barceló Praha (Prague).

Reportage photography to document the workshop 'Pinhole Photography Workshop', conducted by photographer Helena Staniszewska (https://www.behance.net/helkahelka).

This workshop took place at Obejvák Shared Art Studio&Community (Prague).

Photo collaboration with www.therules.org for campaign 'Seeing wetiko'

http://www.seeingwetiko.com/carlos-sussman

Event photography to document the final setup and opening of photography exhibition 'TEMPORAL INVESTIGATIONS' by photographers:

- Andrew Goodall (https://andrewgoodall.myportfolio.com)

- Helena Staniszewska (https://www.behance.net/helkahelka)

This exhibition took place at Obejvák Shared Art Studio&Community (Prague).

Event photography to document the final setup and opening of art group exhibition 
'CANDY-O-PHILIA'.

This exhibition took place at Obejvák Shared Art Studio&Community (Prague).

Photo collaboration with www.myprague.cz. These pictures have been placed on MyPrague Facebook page:

https://www.facebook.com/mypragueapp/photos/a.468723948081.252074.46570483081/10154933227523082/?type=3&theater

https://www.facebook.com/mypragueapp/photos/pb.46570483081.-2207520000.1469036210./10154953899498082/?type=3&theater
